title: Robert Mugabe death: Zimbabwe’s first post-independence leader dies, aged 95
text:
Zimbabwe's long-serving president Robert Mugabe has died in Singapore at the age of 95, the current president Emmerson Mnangagwa said.

Mr Mugabe had been travelling regularly to Singapore for treatment and died after a long battle with illness, his family said.

He ruled Zimbabwe for three decades, before he was forced out in a military coup in November 2017.

Mr Mnangagwa said in a statement posted to Twitter: "It is with the utmost sadness that I announce the passing on of Zimbabwe's founding father and former President, Cde Robert Mugabe.

"Cde Mugabe was an icon of liberation, a pan-Africanist who dedicated his life to the emancipation and empowerment of his people. His contribution to the history of our nation and continent will never be forgotten. May his soul rest in eternal peace."

More follows…
description: Zimbabwe's long-serving president Robert Mugabe has died in Singapore at the age of 95, the current president Emmerson Mnangagwa said.Mr Mugabe had been travelling regularly to Singapore for treatment and died after a long battle with illness, his family said.
